sect2.title: Installation of AT SPI
sect2.para: Install AT SPI by running the following commands:

userinput.command: ./configure --prefix=`pkg-config --variable=prefix ORBit-2.0` \ --libexecdir=`pkg-config --variable=prefix ORBit-2.0`/sbin \ --disable-gtk-doc && cp /usr/bin/libtool . && make && make install
